RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 89. Starter Allowance Purse 20000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE FEBRUARY 22, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since January 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since December 22 A llowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAND WISER was well placed on the inside, made a three wide bid on the turn, took over leaving the turn and drew clear to prove best, driving. VOUCH set the pace on the inside and was headed nearing the quarter pole, proved to be no match for the winner in the lane while clearly second best. SICILIA MIKE was rated along three wide early, made a four wide bid on the turn but weakened, bested rest. OFF THE MEDS was reserved early and saved ground on the turn and had no rally. PRETTY GOOD YEAR was allowed to settle early on the inside, shifted out and was four wide on the far turn and had no rally. LTL BEAR SALOON stalked the pace three wide and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Vouch
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, headed 1/4, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Wiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, bid 3 wide, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Good Year
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, 4 wide turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Sicilia Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 3 wide, bid 4 wide, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Off the Meds
ENTRY.OWNER: Run Fast and Win Stable, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, saved ground turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Ltl Bear Saloon
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 15400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since January 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since December 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,0 00, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JADE'S DREAM vied for the early lead between rivals, then went on to set the pace on the backstretch, drew off in the stretch to prove much the best under right handed crop urging. PRATT was rated along three wide early, moved up between rivals nearing the half mile marker, stalked the winner three wide on the turn but flattened out, second best. SWEEPIN HARD was reserved early and saved ground throughout but lacked a serious rally, bested rest. SOUL STORY vied for the early lead inside, dropped back on the turn, swung out four wide leaving the turn and was empty. ANTE UP ALEX vied for the lead four wide and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweepin Hard
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, saved ground turn, no rally, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Soul Story
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, swung 4 wide upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Jade's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses, pace backstretch, drew off stretch, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: John T. Esposito & Anthony Lo Grippo

ENTRY.NAME: Pratt
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 3 wide, bid between horses 1/2, 3 wide turn, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Ante Up Alex
ENTRY.OWNER: Fanelli John and Longball Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead 4 wide, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 16400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since January 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since December 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,00 0, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRIME TIME PLAYER pressed the pace and made a three wide bid to vie for command by the half mile marker, drew clear on the turn, then drew off leaving the turn and was ridden out to prove much the best. SAILOR SPEED was off slowly, shifted to the inside and advanced on the inside by the half mile marker, shifted out on the turn and was four wide by the quarter pole, came five wide into the lane and was along for the place award. OVER AND THUNDER stalked the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn, but flattened out, lost place late, bested rest. TURNS was settled three wide and lacked a rally. VIOLENT PASS was well placed on the inside and weakened. HOLD THE IRISH lacked a rally. EYE OF GUNFIGHTER was four wide and had no response. ACT OF VALOR set a pressured pace on the inside and was through after a half mile.

ENTRY.NAME: Act of Valor
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Hold the Irish
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Violent Pass
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Over and Thunder
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, 3 wide turn, flattened out, lost 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: Prime Time Player
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, bid 1/2, drew clear turn, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Turns
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle 3 wide, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Eye of Gunfighter
ENTRY.OWNER: Hickory Made Stables and Celtic Venture Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, reserved 4 wide, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Sailor Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, inside 1/2, advanced 4 wide 1/4, up for place outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 28900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since Janu ary 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since December 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PERFECT HIDEAWAY set the pace while two wide, shook clear on the turn, then was challenged leaving the turn and dug in gamely to hold sway late, driving. BARISTA VIXEN was reserved and was four to five wide on the backstretch, made a four wide move on the turn, loomed boldly off the turn but hung in the lane, held place award. ONE MORE KELLY was rated along the inside, angled out in the lane and had a late rally to just miss the place award. IRIE EMPRESS was allowed to settle on the inside, came five wide into the lane and rallied well late. BONITA LASSIE pressed the early pace three wide, then chased the pace on the inside on the far turn and weakened. ANNA ROCKS was rated along three wide, came five wide into the lane and had no rally. AMI'S LINK was settled early, between rivals by the half mile marker, five wide on the turn and lacked a rally. JEANETTEO was four wide into the first turn, stalked the pace four wide, then was three wide on the far turn and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Hideaway
ENTRY.OWNER: McClay Thomas G Sweigart Dennis and Cullari Salvatore
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2 wide, shook clear turn, dug in stretch, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Bonita Lassie
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, inside far turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: One More Kelly
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, saved ground turn, angled out, late rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Anna Rocks
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 3 wide, came 5 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Irie Empress
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, came 5 wide, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Jeanetteo
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, stalked 4 wide, 3 wide turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Ami's Link
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, between 1/2, 5 wide 1/4 pole, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Barista Vixen
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, 4-5 wide backstretch, 4 wide move, hung, held 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 22. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since January 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VALERIE FIRST stalked the pace three wide and made a bid leaving the turn, then wore down pace setter late to get up in time, driving. WHATRUWAITINGFOR was away alertly to set the pace while clear, was well handled and dug in gamely in the stretch but was caught late. MIKEY'S JEWEL was reserved early, advanced on the inside on the turn, swung out four wide leaving the turn and got the bob for the show award. WICKED T was reserved early two wide, three wide on the turn and came five wide into the lane and missed the show award. CAR LADY was settled back early, angled out in the lane and had a belated rally. LAUGH IT OFF tracked the pace four wide and weakened. RAISETONEW HEIGHTS was settled four to five wide and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Car Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, angled out stretch, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked T
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 3 wide turn, came 5 wide, missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Valerie First
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, wore down rival, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Mikey's Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, inside turn, swung 4 wide, got show nod

ENTRY.NAME: Whatruwaitingfor
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set unchallenged pace, h dug in gamely, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Laugh It Off
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Raisetonew Heights
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4-5 wide backstretch, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since January 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAKARI set the pace while clear in the two path, was well handled on the front end and drew out in the lane to prove much the best under right handed crop urging. TILTED TIARA was rated early, shifted out and was four wide nearing the half mile marker while advancing, then made a bid three wide on the turn but could not get to the winner and flattened out late, second best. FUELED UP tracked the pace on the inside and weakened, held show award. BACKSTRETCHBEAUTY was reserved early on the inside, eased out on the turn while advancing and came four wide into the lane, needed a rally and just missed the show award. SIMPLE JUSTICE was void of early speed and then found best tride late on the inside. CRIMSON LILLE was settled three to four wide and tired. FULL OF ATTITUDE stalked the pace three wide and then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Sakari
ENTRY.COMMENT: set unchallenged pace inside, well handled, drew out stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Backstretchbeauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, came 4 wide, needed rally, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Fueled Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, weakened, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Simple Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, inside turn, best stride late inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Full of Attitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Crimson Lille
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3-4 wide backstretch, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Tilted Tiara
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, 4 wide 1/2, bid 3 wide, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 22. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since January 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RELISHMENT was allowed to settle early, made a four wide middle move to take over leaving the backstretch, drew clear on the turn and then drew off to prove much the best, driving. WEEKEND IN COURT was void of early speed, advanced on the turn, came four wide into the lane, shifted in by the furlong marker and rallied for the place award. POLITICAL was off slowly, settled back early, advanced four wide on the far turn, came five wide into the lane and was along for the show award. CONTRAFLOW was well placed early on the inside, shifted out leaving the seven sixteenths, three wide advanced on the turn but weakened in the lane. TRUE GOLD tracked the early pace three wide, made a bid to take over nearing the half mile marker, then chased the winner two wide on the turn and tired. AXXERATOR was allowed to settle on the in side and had no response. MY MAN ELVIS was settled three wide and tired. COMPOUND IT was hustled early to get to the front and was through after a half mile.

ENTRY.NAME: Relishment
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, middle move 4 wide, drew clear turn, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Axxerator
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Political
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, settled back, advanced 4 wide turn, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Contraflow
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, shift out 7/16, 3 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Compound It
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Weekend in Court
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, advanced turn, came 4 wide, shift in, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: My Man Elvis
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle 3 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: True Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, led between calls, tired
